org.lafayette.server.web

Class ServerContextListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.inject.servlet.GuiceServletContextListener
      • org.lafayette.server.web.ServerContextListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, javax.servlet.ServletContextListener

    public final class ServerContextListener
extends com.google.inject.servlet.GuiceServletContextListener
implements javax.servlet.ServletContextListener
    Implements a servlet context listener.
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter
